resources.string: Displays information about your Uber journey, including pickup time and driver & car information
This Target requires the Uber app
Display dynamic information, including progress and vehicle information, alongside the pickup information (not supported on OEM Smartspace)
Hide the Uber notification on the lock screen, when the Uber Target is the first visible Target (requires Native Smartspace)
Set whether to show dynamic information and hide the Uber notification on the lock screen
